add-to-docs.description: Installs package in docs and generates import helpers to sidestep out-of-root import issues.

lit.description: Generates a lit component package. Chains to add-to-docs.

remove-from-docs.description: Removes package and helpers from docs.

rm.description: Removes package files. Chains to remove-from-docs.

update-shared-json.description: Updates shared package.json properties from values in root and docs.
